description:
New Christian Yoga is a way of doing yoga like poses, stretches and other body weight exercise. The difference is the focus will be on Biblical passages, principles and faith. Here is what you get

  • Four different routines for the beginner all the way to the super advanced
  • Bible passages, themes, and other Christian ideas to use while doing your poses
  • Short workouts that you can tailor to meet your specific needs
  • Exercise demonstrations from a seasoned fitness professional with over 10 years experience and 6 certifications

The course is structured in a way to go over the reason behind this type of workout. After you get the background you can then pick and chose what routines to do.

Why take this course?

This course will focus on God and change how you look at doing traditional poses. Because exercise is not just about physical it is also about spiritual and mental.
title: New Christian YOGA (Yes Our God Is Awesome)
